page.title: 18LOCAL HERO
page.content: Geoff Jones is a professional basketball player. He plays for Manchester United, one of the best basketball teams in the U.K. He lives on Marlborough Road in Flixton. I see him most mornings on the way to school. He walks his black dog as he goes to Dillons to buy his morning paper. Geoff is very tall, about 6 feet 6 inches, he has a brown beard, and is slim with broad shoulders. He probably weighs about 11 stone. He drives an F.S.O. car, probably from when he played for Warrington,(F.S.O. were Warrington's sponsors). M.U. are sponsored by Sharp, who make microwave cookers and cassette recorders. Geoff's house is not very big, but looks like it has been modernised. Geoff is on T.V. when his team are playing in a final. Recently they beat Edinbugh in the U-BIX final.
